hero.description: MoneyMap helps you take full control of your personal finances — quickly, securely, and in one place.
hero.subtitle: It's built for people who want a clear picture of where their money goes without complicated spreadsheets.

monobank.title: Connect your Monobank account
monobank.description: Automatically sync your transactions in real time — no manual entry needed.
monobank.details: Keep everything up to date with secure token-based integration.

templates.title: Create your own templates
templates.description: Build personalized dashboards with charts, expense summaries, or recent transactions.
templates.details: Save your favorite layout and reuse it anytime to track what matters most to you.

search.title: Search all your transactions
search.description: Instantly find any payment or income by description, category, or wallet — across your entire history.
search.details: Powerful search across all your financial data with instant results.

wallets.title: Manage multiple wallets
wallets.description: Track your cash, cards, and bank accounts separately, all under one roof.
wallets.details: Each wallet has its own balance, analytics, and filters. Switch wallets in sidebar → all charts & data update instantly.

visualize.title: Visualize your finances
visualize.description: Use clean charts and summaries to spot spending trends, income growth, or where you can save more.
visualize.details: Beautiful, interactive visualizations that make your financial data easy to understand.

privacy.title: Your Data, Your Privacy
privacy.description: MoneyMap runs securely on Supabase with bank-grade authentication. Only you can see your data — nothing is shared or stored without your consent.

cta.title: Start Now
cta.description: Sign in with Google, add your first wallet, and discover how simple managing money can be. Your financial clarity starts here.
